text: "Poison" is a 1989 song by Alice Cooper and is the leading single from his 18th studio album Trash. It went to number 7 in the United States and Finland, number 2 in the United Kingdom and New Zealand, number 3 in Norway, Australia and Ireland, number 8 in the Netherlands and number 39 in Canada. ==References== Category:1989 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Alice Cooper songs
title: Poison (Alice Cooper song)
